nodes.text: How to Do Star Wars the Marvel Way

"How to Do Star Wars the Marvel Way" is an article written by Glenn Greenberg for Back Issue Magazine 9, published in March 2005. The article draws from extensive interviews with the creators of the Marvel Comics Star Wars comic book series, which ran from 1977 to 1986, to present the history of that comic and its evolution through time. Illustrations include black-and-white and pencil art by various Star Wars artists.
